trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Określa kontroler wydruku, które wysyła informacje do drukarki.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> uses this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>korzysta z tej klasy.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na drukowanie, zobacz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Omówienie przestrzeni nazw.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Kończy sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować strony z dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnEndPage jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wyjątek wewnątrz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzenia <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, nie jest wywoływana metoda OnEndPage.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt, który jest wysyłany do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>jest wywoływana, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Czyści w metodzie OnEndPage w <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OnEndPage is called from a printing context of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> is required.
trans-unit.target: Gdy OnEndPage jest wywoływana w kontekście drukowania <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>z <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>jest wymagany.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: Printing to the default printer requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Drukowanie do drukarki domyślnej wymaga <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>

trans-unit.source: All other calls this method requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>
trans-unit.target: Inne wywołania tej metody wymaga <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>z <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane dotyczące drukowania strony w dokumencie.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
trans-unit.target: Natywny Win32 interfejsu programowania aplikacji (API) nie może zakończyć zapisywania do strony.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Kończy sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the printing process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: Nawet jeśli nieprzechwycony wyjątek został zgłoszony podczas drukowania, jest nazywany OnEndPrint.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt, który jest wysyłany do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>jest wywoływana, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy metoda OnEndPrint zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane o tym, jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job.
trans-unit.target: Natywny Win32 interfejsu programowania aplikacji (API) nie może ukończyć zadania drukowania.

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
trans-unit.target: - lub - natywnego interfejsu API Win32 nie można usunąć kontekstu określonego urządzenia (DC).

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować stronę do dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnStartPage jest wywoływana bezpośrednio przed <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt używany w drukowaniu.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>jest wywoływana metoda OnStartPage zestawów <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści — metoda <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane dotyczące drukowania strony w dokumencie.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Początkowo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> właściwość ten parametr będzie <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the OnStartPage method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Wartość zwracana z metody OnStartPage będzie służyć do ustawienia tej właściwości.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> obiekt, który reprezentuje strony z <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data.
trans-unit.target: Natywny Win32 interfejsu programowania aplikacji (API) nie może przygotować sterownika drukarki, aby akceptować dane.

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: - lub - natywnego interfejsu API Win32 nie można zaktualizować określonego drukarki lub miał kontekstu urządzenia (DC) przy użyciu określonych informacji.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy OnStartPrint <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt używany w drukowaniu.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po wywołaniu OnStartPrint <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści — metoda <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint sprawdza, czy ustawienia drukarki są poprawne.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane o tym, jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: The printer settings are not valid.
trans-unit.target: Ustawienia drukarki są nieprawidłowe.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
trans-unit.target: Natywny Win32 interfejsu programowania aplikacji (API) nie można rozpocząć zadania drukowania.
